name: preact-tailwind-starterkit
description: A starter kit with Preact and Tailwind CSS for Firefox, Chrome, and Edge

scripts.dev:firefox: npm run build && node scripts/dev-setup.js firefox
scripts.dev:chrome: npm run build && node scripts/dev-setup.js chrome
scripts.dev:edge: npm run build && node scripts/dev-setup.js edge
scripts.release:all: npm run release:firefox && npm run release:chrome && npm run release:edge

author: StarterKit Developer
